Public Remarks: Tate Downtown is at the center of the downtown south transformation. Designed by award-winning Merrick Architecture. Tate is a new 42 storey landmark just minutes away from the Seawall, Yaletown and the Arts District. With stunning city, mountain and water views along with unmatched private amenities include an expansive fitness center, yoga studio, billiards room, surround sound theatre, social/business lounges, meeting space, beautiful landscaped gardens, port cochere and impressive marble lobby.
